definition: to salvage/to dredge/to fish out (person or object from the sea)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: This CDL tool is very easy to assemble and operate.
sentences.chinese: CDL測井儀打撈工具現場組裝快捷，操作方便。

sentences.english: There are many types of fishing tools.

sentences.chinese: 重船外打撈入許少粗佳瓷器。

sentences.english: Get the fishing tools ready, this shift is expected to do fishing.
sentences.chinese: 把打撈工具準備好，這一班可能要打撈作業。

sentences.english: Get the fishing tools ready, this shift is expected to do fishing.
sentences.chinese: 把打撈工具準備好，這一班可能要打撈作業。

sentences.english: They need some more fishing tools.
sentences.chinese: 他們還必要一些打撈工具。

sentences.english: Why are there many types of fishing tools?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有許多種打撈工具？

sentences.english: Fish the fish with very short introduced-in-length.
sentences.chinese: 用途打撈引入長度很短的落魚。

sentences.english: Overshot parts are usually covered with grease lest they should rust.
sentences.chinese: 卡瓦打撈筒配件通常都塗潤滑油，以防生鏽。
那個工廠生產打撈工具。

sentences.english: The most valuablefindof all was the ship 's log book.
sentences.chinese: 打撈到的東西中最有價值的是船上的航海日誌。

sentences.english: After the ship sank, salvage of its argon was impossible.
sentences.chinese: 輪船沉沒以後，想打撈出其氬氣是不可能的。

sentences.english: As you can see, these fishing tools are very different.
sentences.chinese: 正如你所見到的，這些打撈工具是大不相同的。

sentences.english: They are diving for gold from Spanish wreck.
sentences.chinese: 他們潛水到西班牙失事船上打撈黃金。

sentences.english: They fished up the sunken ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 他們打撈出沉在水中的弓單藥。

sentences.english: Should the fishing tool be broken, we could not go on working.
sentences.chinese: 萬一打撈工具折斷，我們就幹不成了。

definition: to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to intercept/to cut off and capture
